Jason: when bug 167784 is marked resolved please try out the dev build that I'll post on that bug.

Is this happening on every startup or just intermittently?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 167784 ***
*** Bug 168496 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I am not a long time user of the plugin - I just installed it.  So far this happens every time.

This should be fixed now.  Could you please verify by installing the 1.0.0.v20061219-1530 build from one of the following update sites?  Make sure to use "Search for new features" when updating.

  download.eclipse.org/technology/mylar/update-site/test/e3.2
  download.eclipse.org/technology/mylar/update-site/test/e3.3
